item.title: OMG-LLaVA: Bridging Image-level, Object-level, Pixel-level Reasoning and Understanding
item.description: OMG-LLaVA: A single model elegantly bridges image, object, and pixel-level reasoning for superior visual understanding.

item.title: Vitron: A Unified Pixel-level Vision LLM for Understanding, Generating, Segmenting, Editing
item.description: VITRON: a unified pixel-level Vision LLM excels in understanding, generating, segmenting, and editing images and videos.
